name: Bomby Run - Level 5, Stormy Shore v1.0
name_original: Bomby Run - Level 5, Stormy Shore v1.0
description:
!THIS IS A MOBILE GAME!

German Description: In diesem Spiel befinden sie, der Spieler sich als Bomby an einem Stürmischen Strand wieder um seinen Freund zu finden. Bomby liebt Münzen, besonders die roten! Auf diesem Strand gibt es gefährliche Feinde, die du besiegen kannst, indem du auf sie drauf springst! Manche von ihnen halten 1-2 Treffer aus, manche nehmen überhaupt keinen Schaden. 

English Description: In this game you, the Player find yourself as Bomby on a Stormy Shore to find his friend. Bomby loves coins, especially the red ones! On this Stormy Shore there are dangerous enemies that you can defeat by jumping on them! Some of them take 1-2 hits, some take no damage at all. 

 Game made by Lord Zcoper 

------------------------------------------

Difficulty: Easy 🙂

------------------------------------------

Update: v1.0  

-Game release! 

How to play:------------------------------------------

Controls:
 Run Left:                Arrow Left
Run Right:              Arrow Right
Jump:                        Arrow Up
2x Jump:                  Arrow Up 2x
------------------------------------------ 
Score:
Become a better Score by collecting the coins!
Normal Coin: + 14
Red Coin:         +300
------------------------------------------
Tips and Tricks:
Regenerate by collecting heart items (Full Health)
Jump on Enemies to deafet them!
Watch ahead to avoid unwanted situations!
Play on the Mobil Phone!
Look for the Timer! If it's shut down to 0 you Die!
------------------------------------------
Player 

Health:                  3 Hearts
Damage:               1 Heart
Speed:                    580
Jump strenght: 900

------------------------------------------

Special:        Can't be damaged
